charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] noticed the light of 
a swaying flame deep in the forest.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1101_0200_20: Curious, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] snuck deeper into the forest.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_0400_10: Do you want me for something?
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0401_0600_10: I didn’t think anybody would be out here.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0302_0700_10: What are you doing out here?
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0402_0800_10: I was talking with my partner Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_0900_10: I just wanted some time alone with Arcanine.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_1000_10:
It’s noisy outside of the forest...
We can’t talk if it’s noisy.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0401_1700_10: I mean...thank you for being considerate...
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0402_1900_10: I mean...thank you for being considerate...
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_2000_10: I try not to apologize too much.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_2100_10:
You feel better being thanked than being
apologized to, right?
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_2200_10: Do you...understand what I’m trying to say?
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_2700_10:
I’m...very scared of conveying my feelings
in words...
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_2800_10: Even if I don’t mean to, I end up hurting people.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_2900_10:
But I have so many things 
that I want to tell them.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_3000_10:
That’s why I want to take as much time as I can
to talk with Arcanine.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_3200_10: I can’t... The words don’t come out.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0401_3400_10: This is still too fast for me.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0302_3500_10: You don’t have to push yourself!
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0402_3600_10: This is still too fast for me.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_3700_10: I’m not confident that I can communicate well.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_3900_10: I know what I have to do in these situations.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_4100_10:
that all you need to do is say thank you and
give a flower to somebody you love.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_4200_10: It told me that that would be enough.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_4300_10:
I was thinking of going to find some flowers,
but what do you think?
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_4400_10:
Am I expressing myself all right?
*giggle* I’m glad.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_4500_10:
I really appreciate you following me.
Thank you.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_4600_10:
One of these days, I’ll make sure to
thank you properly.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_4700_10:
I love you, Arcanine.
Please stay with me always.
